statements: SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE student_id = 'a98b31df-3ec6-4c83-90e2-55e7c65fc66d';
SELECT id, timestamp FROM attendance_records WHERE session_id = 'f3c02d86-2652-41d1-bcc2-ea0fbc23d1b8';
SELECT session_id, student_id FROM attendance_records WHERE attendance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM attendance_records WHERE session_id = '472e4a6a-58ee-496f-8686-47180c199e0b';
SELECT * FROM attendance_records;
SELECT student_id, attendance_status FROM attendance_records WHERE session_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT session_id, student_id, timestamp FROM attendance_records WHERE attendance_status = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM attendance_records WHERE attendance_status = TRUE;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM attendance_records ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_class_sessions WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT session_id, date, start_time FROM virtual_class_sessions WHERE class_id = 101;
SELECT teacher_id, date, start_time, end_time FROM virtual_class_sessions WHERE start_time > '15:00';
SELECT * FROM virtual_class_sessions WHERE teacher_id = 201 AND date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT class_id, date, start_time, end_time FROM virtual_class_sessions WHERE end_time < '12:00';
SELECT * FROM virtual_class_sessions WHERE class_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC, start_time ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT session_id, date, start_time, end_time FROM virtual_class_sessions WHERE teacher_id = 3 AND date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date ASC, start_time DESC
SELECT teacher_id, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM virtual_class_sessions GROUP BY teacher_id HAVING session_count > 10 ORDER BY session_count DESC
SELECT class_id, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS session_date FROM virtual_class_sessions ORDER BY session_date ASC, class_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT teacher_id, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, start_time, end_time)) AS average_duration FROM virtual_class_sessions WHERE teacher_id IN (1, 2, 3) GROUP BY teacher_id ORDER BY average_duration ASC
SELECT * FROM VirtualClassSessions;
SELECT session_name, session_date FROM VirtualClassSessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT teacher_name FROM VirtualClassSessions WHERE session_name = 'Math Class';
SELECT student_name, email FROM StudentDetails WHERE age > 20;
SELECT session_name, student_name, attendance_status FROM VirtualClassSessions AS vcs INNER JOIN StudentAttendance AS sa ON vcs.session_id = sa.session_id;
SELECT session_name, session_date, teacher_name FROM VirtualClassSessions;
SELECT attendance_id, session_id, student_id, attendance_status FROM StudentAttendance ORDER BY attendance_id DESC;
SELECT session_name, teacher_name FROM VirtualClassSessions WHERE session_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM StudentDetails WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY student_name ASC;

SELECT session_name, teacher_name, student_name FROM VirtualClassSessions JOIN StudentAttendance ON VirtualClassSessions.session_id = StudentAttendance.session_id JOIN StudentDetails ON StudentAttendance.student_id = StudentDetails.student_id;
SELECT * FROM VirtualClassroomSessions;
SELECT session_date, session_time FROM VirtualClassroomSessions WHERE attendance_status = true;
SELECT student_name, student_email, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 10 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, teaching_subject FROM Teachers WHERE teacher_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT session_id, attendance_time FROM AttendanceRecords ORDER BY attendance_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM VirtualClassroomSessions;
SELECT session_id, session_date, session_time, attendance_status FROM VirtualClassroomSessions WHERE session_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, student_email, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 10 ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_email, teaching_subject FROM Teachers WHERE teaching_subject = 'Mathematics';

SELECT AR.session_id, AR.student_id, AR.teacher_id, AR.attendance_time, VC.session_date FROM AttendanceRecords AR JOIN VirtualClassroomSessions VC ON AR.session_id = VC.session_id WHERE AR.attendance_time > '2022-01-01 10:00:00';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT class_date, class_topic FROM virtual_class_sessions WHERE class_date = '2022-01-10';
SELECT session_id, teacher_name FROM virtual_class_sessions WHERE teacher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE attendance_status = 'Present' ORDER BY record_id DESC;
SELECT session_id, class_date, teacher_name, class_topic FROM virtual_class_sessions;
SELECT student_id, student_name, email, age FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT session_id, class_date, attendance_status, student_name FROM virtual_class_sessions JOIN attendance_records ON virtual_class_sessions.session_id = attendance_records.session_id JOIN students ON attendance_records.student_id = students.student_id;
SELECT teacher_name, email, department, COUNT(*) AS classes_taught FROM teachers JOIN virtual_class_sessions ON teachers.teacher_name = virtual_class_sessions.teacher_name GROUP BY teacher_name;
SELECT class_name, class_schedule, teacher_name FROM classes JOIN virtual_class_sessions ON classes.class_name = virtual_class_sessions.class_topic AND classes.class_schedule = 'Morning';
